alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 6:35PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hidalgo County through 700 PM MDT... At 635 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Animas. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camp Garza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
